name: Pony Down
description:
Introduction

Wetsuit recommended. SandTrap and water anchor required. Pothole escape tools required.

Approach

Descent

Exposed stemming over potholes required. Building advanced anchors is required.

Exit

Rappel approximately 60 feet down to the lake and return to your boat. Bring a slightly longer rope in case the lake is lower than you expect.

Red tape

Permit required from the Navajo Nation

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://dyeclan.com/outdooractivities/canyoneering/?id=686

Background
